page.title: 16A DAY IN MY LIFE pt2
page.content: At twelve o'clock it is dinnertime,we go out to play until it is time for us to go in for dinner. In the afternoon we do our work about the Near and Far television programme. At half past three it is home time and the taxi comes to take me home.I get home at about four o'clock and go up stairs and get ready in my old clothes and then Mum,Dad and I go and get the cows into the shed.My brother Steven helps us take the milking units into the shed then we start milking.Then when milking is finished we clean all the sheds out and then go into the house for tea.After that I usually watch the television until eight o'clock when I go to bed
